## What? 

[X Shore](https://xshore.com/) is a pioneering producer of electric motor boats from Sweden. While we are not directly affiliated with X Shore, we are passionate about the brand and its mission. Through our rental offers, we aim to make these beautiful boats more accessible and create awareness of a growing market for more sustainable and environmentally friendly naval vessles.
